mapper.select: SELECT p.dealuserreview, p.dealuserreviewimg, u.nickname, u.imgurl, t.city, t.district, t.`name`, '구매자' AS reviewType FROM post p JOIN user u ON p.dealuserkey = u.userkey JOIN address a ON u.userkey = a.userkey JOIN town t ON a.townkey = t.townkey WHERE p.userkey = #{userkey}

SELECT p.userreview, p.userreviewimg, u.nickname, u.imgurl, t.city, t.district, t.`name`, '판매자' AS reviewType FROM post p JOIN user u ON p.userkey = u.userkey JOIN address a ON u.userkey = a.userkey JOIN town t ON a.townkey = t.townkey WHERE p.dealuserkey = #{userkey}
